title: unable to get the right version of git-annex from neurodebian
body:
```
root@c4e53f712fe6:/d/data/nipype_workshop# apt-get update
Hit http://security.debian.org jessie/updates InRelease
Hit http://neuro.debian.net jessie InRelease
Hit http://neuro.debian.net data InRelease
Hit https://deb.nodesource.com jessie InRelease
Ign http://httpredir.debian.org jessie InRelease
Get:1 http://security.debian.org jessie/updates/main amd64 Packages [452 kB]
Hit http://httpredir.debian.org jessie-updates InRelease
Hit http://httpredir.debian.org jessie Release.gpg
Hit http://httpredir.debian.org jessie Release
Get:2 http://neuro.debian.net jessie/main amd64 Packages [160 kB]
Get:3 http://neuro.debian.net jessie/contrib amd64 Packages [4329 B]
Get:4 http://neuro.debian.net jessie/non-free amd64 Packages [4026 B]
Get:5 http://neuro.debian.net data/main amd64 Packages [6304 B]
Get:6 http://neuro.debian.net data/contrib amd64 Packages [20 B]
Get:7 http://neuro.debian.net data/non-free amd64 Packages [6106 B]
Get:8 https://deb.nodesource.com jessie/main Sources [763 B]
Get:9 https://deb.nodesource.com jessie/main amd64 Packages [969 B]
Get:10 http://httpredir.debian.org jessie-updates/main amd64 Packages [17.6 kB]
Get:11 http://httpredir.debian.org jessie/main amd64 Packages [9049 kB]
Fetched 9702 kB in 9s (1065 kB/s)
Reading package lists... Done
root@c4e53f712fe6:/d/data/nipype_workshop# apt-get install git-annex
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree
Reading state information... Done
git-annex is already the newest version.
The following package was automatically installed and is no longer required:
  rlwrap
Use 'apt-get autoremove' to remove it.
0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 96 not upgraded.
root@c4e53f712fe6:/d/data/nipype_workshop# datalad install ///workshops/nipype-2017/ds000114
/usr/local/miniconda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/datalad/dochelpers.py:172: FutureWarning: split() requires a non-empty pattern match.
  entries = __re_spliter1.split(paramdoc)
[WARNING] Installation of ///workshops/nipype-2017/ds000114 has failed: git-annex of version >= 6.20161210 is missing. Install  git-annex-standalone  from NeuroDebian (http://neuro.debian.net). You have version 5.20150327+git27-g6af24b6-1~nd80+1 [annexrepo.py:_check_git_annex_version:353]
```
